Format

Key-Value pair
Fruit : Apple

Array
Fruits:
  - Orange
  - Apple
  - Banana

Dictionary/Map
Banana:
 Calories: 105
 Fat: 0.4 g
 
Note: spaces have to be the same
Any missmatches will indicate nested propeties

Lists/ Key-values/ Dictionary/map can all be nested

Dictionary is unordered
List is ordered
